Table.description: Shows the distribution of a single feature.

Histograme.description: Shows the frequency distribution of numerical data.

ScatterPlot.description: Visualizes the relationship between two numerical variables.

BoxPlot.description: Shows the distribution of numerical data using medians and quartiles.

Heatmap.description: Represents data in a matrix format with colors indicating values.

PieChart.description: Visualizes proportions of a whole as slices of a pie.

Violin Plots.description: Shows the distribution and density of numerical data.

Pair Plots.description: Shows relationships between multiple features in a dataset.

Stacked Bar Charts.description: Compares categories and subcategories as stacked bars.

Line Graphs.description: Shows the distribution of a single feature or trends over time.

Confusion Matrix.description: Visualizes the performance of classification models.

ROC Curves.description: Evaluates the true positive rate against the false positive rate for classifiers.

Precision-Recall Curve.description: Visualizes the tradeoff between precision and recall for models.

Cluster Scatter Plots.description: Shows data points grouped into clusters.
